alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Denton; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rockwall, southeastern Denton, southwestern Collin and northern Dallas Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highland Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Irving, Mesquite, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Allen, Rowlett, Wylie, Coppell, Rockwall, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Balch Springs, University Park, Sachse, and Addison. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 427 and 444. Interstate 30 between mile markers 45 and 70. Interstate 45 between mile markers 283 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
